name: Knight vs Vampire
description:
Knight vs Vampire

Lore
You the knight, were called by the king to defeat the Lord Vampire.
You have to pass thought all the rooms in the dungeon, to defeat him, let's go for advanture !

Informations
- I'm not a beginner,
- Game make with Unity,
- Theme : Advanture, as a knight you've been enrolled to save the kingdom by defeating the Lord Vampire, so... What are you waiting for ?! Go !

Controls
- WASD as movements
- E as Interact
- Left Shift as dash (Use stamina)
- Left Mouse Click as Attack
- Right Mouse Click as Shielding (Use stamina on hitted)

Credits
- Main Asset : https://pixel-poem.itch.io/dungeon-assetpuck
- Musics : https://bakudas.itch.io/generic-rpg-pack
- Others : MySelf

For BRAVE users, disable the protection or you'll no be able to play.
